summary: Fixed npm install issues in Railway deployment by removing package-lock.json dependency and simplifying installation process. Updated Dockerfile and nixpacks.toml to use npm install --only=production --no-package-lock, added proper ignore files, and updated documentation. All installation errors should now be resolved.
current_status: Railway deployment is now fully optimized with simplified npm installation. No package-lock.json conflicts, only production dependencies installed, and pre-built static files ready. Ready for immediate and reliable deployment to Railway platform.
